originalText.text: Love the olace the door is just wawwww magic at first you might wonder how to get in but you will see push and the magic comes ive never seen such beautiful door. The personnal was sweet.. really here to help you.... gave me water to refresh up on the hot summer....love love love

originalText.text: had such a comprehensive and delightful introduction to Frederic Malle at the Greenwich Village location! Noé was warm, friendly, and extremely knowledgeable about the fragrances and history of the brand. I sampled quite a few in their beautiful scent chambers! the back garden is a lovely respite in the heart of the city. this store has exquisite design and extremely personalized service. have received so many compliments on my new signature scents, and will certainly be returning to explore some more!

originalText.text: This was horrible experience and I will never visit this boutique ever again. The first impression was okay. The seller came up to be and asked what do I want. There was no introduction to the perfume house or anything. I didn’t know much about this perfume house other than portrait a lady, so I asked him if I could try that. Without communicating more to know what exactly I want, he started recommending me other scents. I did not like the third and forth scents he recommended me, so I tried to explain more on what kind of scent I like. When I said I like flower and musk, HE LAUGHED AT ME and said flower and musk don’t go together and there is no such thing. I was very upset at how he was treating me. Then, he stopped me and said that I shouldn’t try more than 5 scents because that is what the perfumers recommend and my nose will not be in good condition to smell these scents.(the way he said was very arrogant) I was more upset because then the seller who was recommending me these perfumes should have tried to get to know me better before he started to recommend things. After that he seems to be not interested in me anymore. I just bought the essential kit to had to get out of there. I went there thinking buying a bottle, but this experience really made me not want to spend single minutes in here and I had to rush out. These are pretty expensive perfumes and they shouldn’t just assume all people can buy $300 perfume by just testing scents for few minutes. That is why the seller is there and they should be the experts in their perfume house to explain/recommend what the customer wants. The other tall seller seems to be very communicative with his customers and professional. It was really shame I had to get recommendations from other guys. He didn’t even care to tell me his name or pass me his name card which other luxury perfume house sellers do. The tall guy looked much professional. I think he said he works for other boutique in upper nyc. I’m going to visit there next and give one more chance to this perfume house. I’ve been to many different perfume house boutique and this was the worst. Do not recommend this place. It really made bad impression to the perfume house.

originalText.text: What a magical boutique that has really truly memorable fragrances and exceptional service. Tess is spectacular and I always feel a little giddy when she describes a perfume to me. She just has this way of being able to express why a particular creation is so special. It always makes my whole experience a happy one and she is incredibly sweet! Love it here.

text.text: What a magical boutique that has really truly memorable fragrances and exceptional service. Tess is spectacular and I always feel a little giddy when she describes a perfume to me. She just has this way of being able to express why a particular creation is so special. It always makes my whole experience a happy one and she is incredibly sweet! Love it here.

originalText.text:
Had a great experience with Eddie who was super patient, knowledgeable and passionate about fragrance.

He definitely knew what I liked!

Store was also beautiful - I’ve wanted to visit for a long time and was seriously impressed.
